DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial study assess performance automate glucose control system ( Artificial Pancreas , AP ) device home setting subject type 1 diabetes . Specifically , investigator test zone model predictive control AP enhance run-to-run optimization basal rate ( BR ) insulin carbohydrate ratio ( CR ) . This protocol build investigator previously validate Zone-MPC Health Monitoring System ( HMS ) algorithm ( ClinicalTrials.gov : NCT01929798 ) integrate Diabetes Assistant ( DiAs ) system ( ClinicalTrials.gov : NCT02463682 ) . The AP system use NCT02463682 use algorithmic adjustment CR 's prior closed-loop initiation , continue BR CR algorithmic optimization closed-loop use long duration . The system evaluate 12 subject per site ( n=36 subject ) 15 week 3 different site ( William Sansum Diabetes Center , University Virginia , Mayo Clinic , Rochester , MN ) .
